amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 116-37 to require the FCC to share the list of 700 rules that will be permanently forborne by the FCC should this bill become law.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Latta amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Latta.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Latta amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
